title: Benihana wine menu includes international selections
statement: Benihana's wine menu features wines from multiple countries including Italy, France, New Zealand, Argentina, and the United States.

citations.quote: Ferrari Brut Trento, Italy ... Moët & Chandon Brut Imperial (split) Champagne, France ... Whitehaven Marlborough, New Zealand ... Bodega Norton Reserva Mendoza, Argentina
